p: Neurospheres and organoids are the most popular 3D cultures used to study viral infection (18/24 studies on 3D models). While neurospheres consist of one cell type, such as neural precursors, neurons, or other CNS cells (Garcez et al., 2017), organoids present multiple cell types, and represent some aspect of organ structure and function (Dang et al., 2016; Nowakowski et al., 2016; Wells et al., 2016; Gabriel et al., 2017; Sacramento et al., 2017; Zhou et al., 2017).
